ingredients.ingredient: 1 large head cauliflower, broken into small florets

cookingTips: Break cauliflower into small, uniform florets so they cook evenly and get crispy
Toss with oil and seasonings in a bowl before roasting for even coating
Roast at high temperature (425-450°F) for 20-25 minutes until edges are dark and crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you ensure the cauliflower pieces get crispy on the outside while staying tender inside?
